summary: A Naturalistic preset based upon my old (and first) ENB that will make your jaw fall.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][color=#6aa84f]Hello! Welcome to Docter's ENB Remastered, this ENB is a remake of my broken and outdated Docter's ENB which was a huge success back in the day. This ENB is not entirely based on performance, but since my BETA release it has improved.[/color]

[color=#ff7700]Updated for ENB Series 266![/color]

[/size][color=#c27ba0][size=3][b]MY Performance is 35-50FPS Outdoors and 60FPS indoors[/b] with these specs:

GTX770 2GB
i7 2600k @ 3.4Ghz
9GB RAM @ 1600Mhz

[/size][/color]This ENB preset was originally made for use with Pure Weather, which is recommended, but is NOT REQUIRED!

[b][i][color=#ea9999][size=4]If you don't like the Cinematic Bars, to disable them in-game you press shift+enter and go to the enbeffect.txt section and disable Letterbox Bars.
To turn ENB off ingame press shift+\.[/size][/color][/i][/b]

[img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7408/16380984956_6df39598f8_c.jpg[/img]

[color=#e06666][b][u][size=5]Install/Uninstall

TO INSTALL[/size][/u][/b]

1. Download [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0266.htm]ENB Series v0.266[/url] (the download button is on the bottom).

2. Extract [b]ONLY the [size=4]d3d9.dll[/size] and the [size=4]enbhost.exe[/size] [/b]from the [b]wrapper version [/b]to your Skyrim directory, (by default at C:Program Files (x86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim).

3. Place enb Files into the Skyrim directory

4.Add optional files to skyrim directory if you want.

5. Add (or modify) these lines to your [b]SkyrimPrefs.ini[/b] file (located by default in C:/Users/xxxxxxx/Documents/My Games/Skyrim)
iMultiSample=0
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1

6. Set your enblocal.ini file for these two lines- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50214/?]For a tutorial go here:[/url]
ReservedMemorySizeMb=xxx
VideoMemorySizeMb=xxxx

7. Open your Skyrim Launcher (NOT SKSE) and diasable ALL Anti-Aliasing and Anisotropic Filtering


[b][u][size=5]TO UNINSTALL[/size][/u][/b]
Delete all files you added from the enb

[img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8682/15876886253_2dfd3065c5_c.jpg[/img][/color][/center][center][size=6][b][color=#93c47d]
[url=http://modwat.ch/TheDrDocter#/plugins]My Modlist[/url]
[img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8634/16380984366_d70d9f3575_c.jpg[/img]
[/color][/b][/size]
[size=4][b]For Performance boost I recommend using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48387/?]Real UgridstoLoad Solution and more[/url][/b][/size]

******************************************************************************************************************************************************************************
Credits:

- Boris Voronstov-For making ENB Series
-Tamu75 for the updated adaptionV2 lines in enbeffect.txt
-gp65cj04 - For original DoF
-JawZ - For Original Letterbox[/center]
author: TheDrDocter
